scripts.electron:build:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc --noEmit false || cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:mac:universal: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc --noEmit false || cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && electron-builder --mac --universal
scripts.electron:build:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc --noEmit false || cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:all: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc --noEmit false || cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && electron-builder --mac --win
